originalLyrics:
Tu penses à moi, j'pense à faire de l'argent
J'suis pas ta daronne, j'te ferai pas la morale



Tu parles sur moi, y a R
Crache encore, y a R
Tu voulais m'avoir, tu savais pas comment faire
Tu jouais un rôle, tu finiras aux enfers
"T'façon, Nakamura, je l'ai couchée"
Le jour où on se croise, faut pas tchouffer
Tu jouais le grand frère pour me salir
Tu cherches des problèmes sans faire exprès
Putain, mais tu déconnes
C'est pas comme ça qu'on fait les choses
Putain, mais tu déconnes
C'est pas comme ça qu'on fait les choses
Putain, mais tu déconnes
C'est pas comme ça qu'on fait les choses

texts.title: Réflexions Quotidiennes
text: Je savais que tu penses toujours à moi.
Quand tu parles, je crache la vérité.
Je jouais hier, et je ferai pareil demain.

texts.title: Une Journée Difficile
text: Ma daronne me parle de morale ce jour-là,
Des problèmes avec l'argent comme toujours.
Mon rôle dans toutes ces choses étranges,
Me mène directement aux enfers maintenant.

texts.title: Message Important
text: Je ne sais pas encore comment
ni où tu vas exprès aujourd'hui

texts.title: Avertissement
text: Faut pas tchouffer ni salir ce qui fait mal,
Tu cherches et déconnes, mais tu finiras couchée,
Je croise les doigts pour toi.

texts.title: Message Direct
text: J'suis là pour m'avoir à t'façon,

texts.title: Conseil Fraternel
text: On l'ai vu se battre comme le grand frère,
Mais c'est pour me protéger sans doute.

texts.title: Observation Simple
text: Ça, c'est les choses qu'on fait ensemble.

phrases.originalFrench: Je savais que tu penses toujours à moi.
Quand tu parles, je crache la vérité.
Je jouais hier, et je ferai pareil demain.
Ma daronne me parle de morale ce jour-là,
Des problèmes avec l'argent comme toujours.
Mon rôle dans toutes ces choses étranges,
Me mène directement aux enfers maintenant.
Je ne sais pas encore comment
ni où tu vas exprès aujourd'hui
Faut pas tchouffer ni salir ce qui fait mal,
Tu cherches et déconnes, mais tu finiras couchée,
Je croise les doigts pour toi.
J'suis là pour m'avoir à t'façon,
On l'ai vu se battre comme le grand frère,
Mais c'est pour me protéger sans doute.
Ça, c'est les choses qu'on fait ensemble.

solutions.primaryTranslation: I knew you always think of me.
alternatives: I knew you're always thinking about me.
I knew you never forget about me.
distractors: I know you always thought of me.
I knew you were always thinking of me.
I knew you would always think of me.

solutions.primaryTranslation: What did you want to do today?
alternatives: What were you planning to do today?
What did you have in mind for today?
distractors: What do you want to see today?
What would you like to go today?
What were you going to do today?

solutions.primaryTranslation: When you speak, I spit the truth.
alternatives: When you talk, I tell it like it is.
When you speak, I'm brutally honest.
distractors: When you spoke, I spit the truth.
While you're speaking, I tell the truth.
Whenever you speak, I will spit the truth.

solutions.primaryTranslation: I was playing yesterday, and I'll do the same tomorrow.
alternatives: I played yesterday, and I'll do it again tomorrow.
I was playing yesterday, and tomorrow will be no different.
distractors: I played yesterday, and I will do similar tomorrow
I was playing yesterday, but I won't do the same tomorrow.
I played yesterday, and I might do the same tomorrow.

solutions.primaryTranslation: My mom was lecturing me about morals that day,
alternatives: My mother was giving me a moral lesson that day,
That day my mom was preaching to me about ethics,
distractors: My mom will lecture me about morals that day,
My mom has lectured me about morals today,
My mom would lecture me every day.
Money problems always.
Money problems are coming.
Money problems were usual.

solutions.primaryTranslation: My role in all these strange things,
alternatives: My part in all these weird things,
My involvement in all these odd matters,
distractors: My role for all those things,
My role was in all the strange things,
My task in all these strange things,

solutions.primaryTranslation: Is leading me straight to hell now.
alternatives: Takes me directly to hell right now.
Is sending me straight to the underworld now.
distractors: Was leading me straight to hell now.
Will lead me straight to hell now.
Is leading me back to hell now.

alternatives: I haven't figured out how yet
distractors: I didn't know how yet
I won't know how still
I never knew how

solutions.primaryTranslation: nor where you're deliberately going today
alternatives: or where you're intentionally heading today
neither where you're purposely going today
distractors: nor where you deliberately left today
or where you might deliberately go today
nor where you're deliberately going tomorrow

solutions.primaryTranslation: Don't brush off or make light of what hurts
alternatives: Don't dismiss or taint what's painful
distractors: Don't brush off what hurts
You should brush off or make light of what hurts
Don't brush off and ignore what hurts

solutions.primaryTranslation: You mess around and joke, but you'll end up falling
alternatives: You're playing games but you'll crash eventually
You fool around but you'll hit rock bottom
distractors: You messed around, but you'll end up falling
You mess around and joke, so you'll end up falling
You messed around and joked, and you ended up falling

solutions.primaryTranslation: I'm keeping my fingers crossed for you.
distractors: I kept my fingers crossed for you
I'll keep my fingers crossed for you
I'm keeping my fingers crossed about you too

solutions.primaryTranslation: I see you on your path
alternatives: I can see where you're headed
distractors: I saw you on your path
I see you along your road
I will see you on your path

solutions.primaryTranslation: I'm here to handle things your way
alternatives: I'm here to do it your style
I'm here to follow your lead
distractors: I was here to handle things your way
I'm here handling things your way
I'm here to handle things in my way

alternatives: I guess you get it now
Now you see what I mean
distractors: I thought you understood now
I think you will understand now
I think you understood then

solutions.primaryTranslation: We saw him fight like a big brother would
alternatives: We watched him fight to protect like a big brother
We saw him standing up like an older brother
distractors: We will see him fight like a big brother
I saw him fight like a big brother would
We saw him fighting as the older sister

solutions.primaryTranslation: But it's probably to protect me.
alternatives: But I guess it's to keep me safe
But no doubt it's to shield me
distractors: But it was probably to protect me
But it's probably to protect them
But it's definitely not to protect me

solutions.primaryTranslation: These are the things we do together.
distractors: Those were the things we did together
These are the things they do together
This is the thing we do together
